content: I didn't think hitching a ride and getting lost this time... {短暂停}{A开心}would bring me straight to your place! Want me to mine all the rocks in the area bhan?
{A虎掌碎石}Don't you think smashing rocks is just so much fun and excitement? WHAM WHAM WHAM! With one strike of your claws... Hm? You're using a mattock? Why aren't you using your claws...?

I'm looking for some special stones to craft furniture. Some ores emit a phosphorescent glow. Just imagine it's nighttime, and all the lights are off... {A得意}and the bed starts glowing in the dark! Isn't that super cool, bhan?
How'd I get lost and ended up at your place?! {短暂停}{A沉醉闻}Something smells really good here... Whacha cookin'?
{A沉醉闻}Something smells delicious! Are you cookin' something good? <style=SizeSmall>I knew I made the right call coming to you after only 7 meals today.</style>
